des:
Kami cameras are designed to securely monitor your home or business from the Kami app on your smartphone 

With the Kami Camera skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now interact with your Kami cameras by voice. 

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your Kami account* and discover your cameras. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa: http://amzn.to/291lR7u

When using the skill, you will need to create names for your devices. There are two ways to create these names:

1. Use the names you previously set up. This will be shown in the Kami app and can be changed.

2. Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add devices to that group. 

More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group http://amzn.to/2pIe1Vq

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can give commands such as:

"Alexa, show me the room camera"
"Alexa, show me the backyard camera"

*To use this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the Kami app.
